statements: SELECT * FROM SustainabilityInitiative;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, strategy FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy, initiative_name, impact_reduction FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE impact_reduction >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE strategy LIKE '%renewable%';
SELECT initiative_name, strategy FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE initiative_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE impact_reduction > 0.5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, end_date FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, impact_reduction FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE strategy = 'Recycling' ORDER BY impact_reduction DESC;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, start_date, end_date, impact_reduction FROM SustainabilityInitiative WHERE start_date <= '2022-12-31' AND end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM strategy;
SELECT strategy_name, focus_area FROM strategy;
SELECT * FROM strategy WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, focus_area FROM strategy ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, start_date, end_date FROM strategy WHERE focus_area = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM strategy WHERE strategy_name = 'Marketing Strategy';
SELECT strategy_name, focus_area FROM strategy WHERE focus_area = 'Digital Marketing';
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM strategy ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, metric_name, value FROM impact_measurement WHERE value > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, measurement_date FROM strategy JOIN impact_measurement ON strategy.strategy_id = impact_measurement.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiative;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM sustainability_initiative;
SELECT initiative_name, total_cost FROM sustainability_initiative WHERE total_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM sustainability_initiative JOIN reduction_strategies ON sustainability_initiative.initiative_id = reduction_strategies.initiative_id;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiative;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, total_cost FROM sustainability_initiative WHERE total_cost > 10000;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date, total_cost FROM sustainability_initiative ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT i.initiative_name, r.strategy_name, r.implementation_date FROM sustainability_initiative i JOIN reduction_strategies r ON i.initiative_id = r.initiative_id;
SELECT i.initiative_name, e.impact_type, e.impact_score FROM sustainability_initiative i JOIN environmental_impact e ON i.initiative_id = e.initiative_id WHERE e.impact_score > 5;
SELECT id, name, description FROM Initiative;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM Initiative WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ImpactMeasurement WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT strategy_id, initiative_id, implementation_date, success FROM StrategyImplementation WHERE success = True;
SELECT name, description FROM Strategy ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Initiative WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Initiative WHERE id = 2;

SELECT Initiative.name, ImpactMeasurement.metric_name, ImpactMeasurement.metric_value FROM Initiative JOIN ImpactMeasurement ON Initiative.id = ImpactMeasurement.initiative_id WHERE ImpactMeasurement.metric_value > 100 ORDER BY ImpactMeasurement.metric_value DESC;
SELECT Strategy.name, StrategyImplementation.success FROM Strategy JOIN StrategyImplementation ON Strategy.id = StrategyImplementation.strategy_id WHERE StrategyImplementation.success = true;

SELECT Initiative.name, Strategy.name, StrategyImplementation.implementation_date, StrategyImplementation.success FROM Initiative JOIN StrategyImplementation ON Initiative.id = StrategyImplementation.initiative_id JOIN Strategy ON Strategy.id = StrategyImplementation.strategy_id WHERE Initiative.start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Initiative.start_date ASC, Strategy.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiative;
SELECT id, name, description, start_date, end_date FROM sustainability_initiative ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM sustainability_initiative WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT team_members.member_name, team_members.role, sustainability_initiative.name FROM team_members JOIN sustainability_initiative ON team_members.initiative_id = sustainability_initiative.id;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiative;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM sustainability_initiative WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, SUM(metric_value) AS total_value FROM environmental_impact_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING total_value > 100;

SELECT team_members.member_name, team_members.role, sustainability_initiative.name FROM team_members JOIN sustainability_initiative ON team_members.initiative_id = sustainability_initiative.id WHERE team_members.role = 'Manager';

SELECT reports.report_date, reports.report_content, sustainability_initiative.name FROM reports JOIN sustainability_initiative ON reports.initiative_id = sustainability_initiative.id WHERE reports.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
